effect.sword-shield: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
